title: Trials.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Trials.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  



Trials Evolution: Gold Edition






Release year : 2012
Genre : Arcade / Racing (Motorcycles) / 3D
Developer : RedLynx
Publisher : Ubisoft Entertainment
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng | Multi11
Voice language:  Eng
Crack:SKIDROW

29fdd9d013a700e8qwq.png


System requirements:  

Operating system : Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz
Memory : 2 GB
Video : 512 Mb, Shader Model 3.0, c support for DirectX 10.0
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX10
Free space on hard drive : 3 GB


Game information:  


Trials Evolution: Gold Edition marks the triumphant return of the
franchise Trials platform PC.Series Games Trials, the famous franchise
of RedLynx, first gained attention in 2008 after the release of Trials
2 SE for the PC. Instant success on an independent platform, has led to
further popularity on the Xbox, but the players on the PC since it is
strongly demanded to continue Trials.

Trials Evolution: Gold Edition - an answer to their expectations.


RePack Features:  

Trials Evolution: Gold Edition
Game Version - v1.05
Do not cut / recoded




Trials Fusion





Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Arcade / Racing (Motorcycles) / 3D
Developer : RedLynx, in collaboration with Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Kiev
Publisher : Ubisoft
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng | Multi8
Voice language:  Eng
Crack: SKIDROW





System requirements:  


Operating system : Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1
Processor : Intel Core i3 550 @ 3.2 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
Memory : 3 GB
Video : nVidia GeForce GTS450 or AMD Radeon HD770 (1024MB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or Higher)
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX10
Free space on hard disk : 7 GB


Game information:  


Immerse yourself in the endless stream of racing events in the incredible
world Trials Fusion. Show all, what can overcome obstacles and soaring
skyward on trampolines in an attempt to break the record of the best racers
in the world. It does not matter whether you go through the track alone,
competing with friends or participate in global competition - in the world
around you there is always a sense of competition. In this case, the official
race tracks - it's only the beginning. Those who intend to conquer more and
more insane tracks, waiting for the rich world of custom tracks designed by
the most creative and skilled writers. Long-term support of the game and
regularly adding to it new features and content will further expand the
universe Trials and tirelessly to please the players new, unusual challenges.




RePack Features:  


Trials Fusion


Includes Update 9
Do not cut / recoded


Additions :  

Riders of the Rustlands;
Empire of the Sky;
Welcome to the Abyss
